field.name: Partner
field.label: Partner
field.help: Select a partner for which the analytic distribution will be used (e.g. create new customer invoice or Sales order if we select this partner, it will automatically take this as an analytic account)

field.name: PartnerCategory
field.label: Partner Category
field.help: Select a partner category for which the analytic distribution will be used (e.g. create new customer invoice or Sales order if we select this partner, it will automatically take this as an analytic account)

field.name: Company
field.label: Company
field.help: Select a company for which the analytic distribution will be used (e.g. create new customer invoice or Sales order if we select this company, it will automatically take this as an analytic account)
